name: vail
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to take off your hat or other head covering as a mark of respect to someone: Crowned heads vailed before the statue of Beethoven, doing homage to the royalty of genius.
to let a flag touch the ground, as a mark of respect, for example when someone has died: When the flag is vailed on Remembrance Sunday, it is not considered as a desecration.
